item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao-Tzu
item.description: "Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love." -- Lao-Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Silence is a source of Great Strength." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Stop thinking, and end your problems." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tse
item.description: "Watch your thoughts; they become words. Watch your words; they become actions. Watch your actions; they become habit. Watch your habits; they become character. Watch your character; it becomes your destiny." -- Lao Tse

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Manifest plainness, Embrace simplicity, Reduce selfishness, Have few desires." -- Lao Tzu
